data.text: @PainterTactical Oh no! So sorry to hear this.  Get well!
@wrkbnchwarriors Thanks. Can’t quite get up the enthusiasm to paint yet, hopefully in the next day or so.
@IAFuller Thanks. Fingers crossed I’m feeling better soon. Fortunately my regular opponent Dave has it too so at least we will both be out of action at the same time.
@Medical_Int Thanks. Yep, resting, taking VitC, zinc etc. I feel worse than I thought I would but not that bad in the scheme of things.
@PainterTactical Damm ☹ Wishing you a speedy recovery.
@PainterTactical Take. Are and get some rest and painting done. Hope you’re up and unpinned soon
@PainterTactical Ah, that's crap news. I caught it after having 3 shots and it wasn't too bad, more worrying for me as I'm immuno suppressed, which shows that they work. Hope it passes quickly.
@PainterTactical The vac keeps symptoms to a minimum. Rest, lots of water and immune boosters. After all it’s a virus.
